name: FNaF: The Lost Pizzeria
description:
Controls:

O to save game.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to look around.

Use 1-4 to close their corresponding doors.

Door 1 - Freddy

Door 2 - Bonnie

Door 3 - Chica

Door 4 - Foxy

Credits:

Title screen art: RopeC4D1637 on DeviantArt

Sounds and animatronic sprites: Fandom

Other artwork by me

Main menu theme by me

Voice acting by me

Title Screen scripting by DKuniverse

In-game scripting by me

Custom Cursor by riku11615 on Pixilart

--ATTENTION: You must have sound on to determine where the animatronics are--

--WARNING: This game contains (very) loud noises--

--Story--

The year? 1985. The place? Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria. William Afton had just lost his younger son to a springlock failure in 1983. But, he still had to continue his franchise. A new restaurant has been opened. But both William and Henry don't want to repeat their mistakes. All they need is a security guard... and you're just the perfect fit. The job is just enough for you to pay your rent. Is it dangerous? Yes. Is it scary? Yes. iS It fUn? oF cOUrsE iT IS!>3r@#4

*Connection Terminated*

Experience the horror of the lost FNaF location of 1985! Yes, you've worked with lights, vents, doors and air ducts, or even all of them at once! But; have you ever had to deal with 4 doors at once? In this game, you must fend off animatronics that can sneak up on you from all around you! From night 1, all four of the original animatronics will be active! They become more and more aggressive until they start attacking every 5-10 seconds! Listen to the unique sounds of the 4 different animatronics from FNaF 1 (2014), and close their corresponding door! Remember: Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for any death or dismemberment that occurs.
